messages.content: Viva mein professor ne itne tough questions puche ki main answer nahi de paaya. Fail kar diya. Ab supplementary dena padega.
Tough questions aur answer nahi aa paye - fail hone ka wo moment humiliating raha hoga. Supplementary ki tension zyada hai ya embarrassment ki yaad?
I'm juggling part-time work and full-time studies. Exhausted all the time. Grades are slipping but I need the money.
Work aur studies dono - exhaustion permanent feel ho raha hoga. Grades slip kar rahe par money zaroori hai - wo helplessness tough hai yaar?
Semester khatam hone wala hai aur main already soch raha hoon next semester ka stress. Break mein bhi relax nahi kar paata.
Ek semester khatam bhi nahi hua aur next ka stress already start - break mein bhi peace nahi. Relax nahi kar paana chronic anxiety hai ya pattern dikha raha ki hamesha yahi hota hai?
